name: PeerMe MultiSig: Get Action Last Index
title: View last proposal ID
description: Use when a user wants to see the total number of proposals ever created in a multi-sig wallet. Returns the last proposal ID number.

messages.success: Last proposal ID: {{LAST_INDEX_NUMBER}}. {{LAST_INDEX_NUMBER === 0 ? 'No proposals have been created yet.' : 'Total proposals created: ' + LAST_INDEX_NUMBER}}
messages.info: {{LAST_INDEX_NUMBER === 0 ? 'No proposals have been created in this MultiSig wallet yet' : 'This MultiSig wallet has created ' + LAST_INDEX_NUMBER + ' proposal(s)'}}
